forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: small change for hand replacements

comments.text: accounts under 2 hours old now won't be able to put on arms that replace hands! (as of version 181.10, you're on [version].)
this is so newcomers can get to know the default hands first and don't as easily run into usability issues some hands may cause.

thread.latestCommentText: this is meant so newcomers can get to know the default hands first and don't as easily run into usability issues some hands may cause.
